kulami.gui

Class StatusDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.gui.StatusDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, StatusDisplayer

    public class StatusDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatusDisplayer, GameObserver
    StatusDisplay displays data about the current game state in two JPanels, one for the local player and one for the opponent.

    The status display is updated whenever information changes or when the game state changes.

    Author:
    gordon
